clearcontrol.microscope

Class MicroscopeBase<M extends MicroscopeBase<M,Q>,Q extends MicroscopeQueueBase<M,Q>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.microscope.MicroscopeBase<M,Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - microscope type
    Q - queue type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsynchronousSchedulerFeature, HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, QueueDeviceInterface<Q>, StartStopDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature, MicroscopeInterface<Q>

    public abstract class MicroscopeBase<M extends MicroscopeBase<M,Q>,Q extends MicroscopeQueueBase<M,Q>>
extends VirtualDevice
implements MicroscopeInterface<Q>, StartStopDeviceInterface, AsynchronousSchedulerFeature, LoggingFeature
    Microscope base class providing common fields and methods for all microscopes
    Author:
    royer
